website_summaries.verdict: A recliner with a lot to offer in the way of comfort and convenience from a leading brand.
pros: A comfortable, user-friendly recliner by a top brand
Power recline function is easy to maneuver and capable of various positions, including total recline
cons: Taller individuals may find that it's too small/short, especially in the fully reclined position
Seat may be too firm for some

customer_reviews.title: Nice Chair!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and love the powered recline and sit up. I have arthritic knees and pushing on a leg rest is almost impossible. With this chair I dont have to!
customer_reviews.author: D.T.

customer_reviews.title: REPLACEMENT CORDED POWER SUPPLY PART IS NOT AVAILABLE
customer_reviews.text: When you get your chair, you better hope that the power supply cord comes with the chair, or is not lost or damaged later on. Neither the supplier nor their manufacturer has that basic component available for replacement, even though they have continued to sell the same chair for years.
customer_reviews.author: TRC

customer_reviews.title: Great value!!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is quiet and efficient. I like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: You have to know it's small
customer_reviews.text: I bought this BECAUSE of all the reviews that it's a small recliner. I am 5'1, and when just the bottom is extended it rests at my ankles. However, it is the best buy I've ever made. Love the color, it's that medium gray that just fits...Soft as the daylights. It's a little stiff, but with use, it will relax. If it came relaxed, I'd worry it wouldn't hold up. The electric part is wonderful. I do have one thing to note. I have short arms, when totally extended, I cannot reach the electric controls unless I sit up. If you are buying this for a medical reason, please make note of that.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect recliner for us !
customer_reviews.text: Perfect ! Well made, soft & comfortable. lift is fast and reclines way back. Would not be good for very tall people...got this for wifey who is 5 feet tall...perfect for her..she loves it.......received way ahead of scheduled delivery...well packed and easy to assemble....
customer_reviews.author: VIPERICHNAPLES

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Chair for very short people 5'2 and under.
customer_reviews.text: Chair arrived today. Hoping that I end up loving it and that it is worth the money. It is very comfortable. 2 things, In order to have the foot rest all the way up you must be 3/4 reclining. It will not allow you to be sitting upright with the foot rest extended. AND.... if you are taller than 5'2, your feet will hang off the chair. The color of the Dark Grey is more like a Mocha Grey. Still pretty tho.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri C.

customer_reviews.title: Price and looks are good
customer_reviews.text: For the price...I suppose I shouldn't complain. Sometimes we just get what we pay for. Looks very nice and it is easy to put together. However, it is not very comfortable....feels hard when lying back on it and even the seat is a bit hard. I would not buy again although I did buy 2 because of the great price. If you want just a nice looking chair for a good price, this will do. If you are looking for a really comfy recliner to spend hours on...this is not it!
customer_reviews.author: Hermelinda Banuelos

customer_reviews.title: A really good value!
customer_reviews.text: This char arrived early, was easy to assemble, and is performing exactly as advertised! Loving it, and I hope that it will continue to perform.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Z.

customer_reviews.title: Motor died before I owned this chair 2 months!!!
customer_reviews.text: We received our chair mid September. It is very comfortable and the grey color is great. But the motor died today and it no longer reclines. I am very upset as it is too late to return. It didn’t even last 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: dlm002

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in due time, worked for 3 weeks, then quit
customer_reviews.text: Worked for 3 weeks then quit. Hard to get warranty work done on it. Dont buy extra coverage. Two items in a row over 700 bucks spent then have spent endless hours trying to get answer for warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Hollis

customer_reviews.title: Glide bumpy
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews and basically fair. Have now had for 3 months and they electric glide for the chair is now very bumpy and noisy. When chair was received the material that covered the back of the chair on the bottom foes not match in length with no velcro to keep closed. Informed seller all they would do is refund $10. For the quality of the name that is on the chair very poor. Now I have a chair with a noisy glide and who knows how long it will last not very happy. The company has respond and basically said to bad its over 60 days. Wow is all I can say!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rita M Crook

customer_reviews.title: runs short for tall people
customer_reviews.text: Like every one said it runs short for tall people.. I'm 5'3" and runs small.. my feet will go beyond the seat and that does not please me.. my husband can't use it as he is taller
customer_reviews.author: aktu

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and quiet
customer_reviews.text: Totally quiet motor. It's comfortable. I try not to sit in it if I need to stay awake. Your feet will hang off the end but that's common . I curl up in it allot and my feet lay on the rest just right. Easy to assemble. I put a cover on it but that's me. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Hamguy

customer_reviews.title: not so comfortable  for me
customer_reviews.text: being labeled sorta I was expecting superior comfort! It is too hard, but is beginning to soften a little bit. Looks very nice. Was a little bit harder to assemble because the back did not match up to the slots it was supposed to fit into.
customer_reviews.author: limey

customer_reviews.title: Great chair
customer_reviews.text: Had three months - easy to put together - may need assistance -good for me 5’6” Probably bigger too. Wide enough - I’m 150 lbs. mother likes it and she is smaller . Easy to operate. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Texas 123

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable chair
customer_reviews.text: This chair was a wise purchase. It is very comfortable. I like the way you just press a button and it reclines. Got it for my husband but when he’s not using it I am.
customer_reviews.author: Prudence Salijoski

customer_reviews.title: Not necessarily for the tall
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my father. At 5’10” his feet hang off the end, so I wish it was designed a bit more for the taller individual, but the width is generous, the buttons are easy to reach/use, and he falls asleep in it on a regular basis. While soft it’s not super deep, so you don’t struggle to get out of it either.
customer_reviews.author: Raven

customer_reviews.title: grrreat!
customer_reviews.text: I am 84 years old, and have recliners with the handle. It was too hard for me, o i decided to get a power one. Also, I have to sleep in mine. I love reclining way back for sleeping!! THANK YOU, SERTA
customer_reviews.author: Ajanet norgardmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Good deal for the money. A little small for someone that is 6 ft. tall, doesn’t provide any neck support.
customer_reviews.author: George W

customer_reviews.title: Comfort Galore
customer_reviews.text: Best recliner ever for the great price! Super fast delivery, quality #1. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: MARIS O

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal
customer_reviews.text: It is a great price for power. Definitely not the perfect comfort for someone 6’ tall like me but does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Steve O

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice looking chair and very comfortable to sit in.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Cannot beat this recliner for the price! Love the electric raising and lowering of foot and back areas. The only problem is that is you lose electric power while reclined in chair you will be forced to climb out of it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love my chair
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair, I am 5’1” and it is perfect for me, also i I am handicapped and cannot use my right arm it’s so easy to get up and down with this chair.
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: VERY NICE, SMALL RECLINER, SETS LITTLE HARD BUT GREAT HEIGHT AND COMFORTABLE.
customer_reviews.text: Did not think would like it as cushions seem hard and stiff, but is actually nice, really like that you don't set down in it as is easy to get in and out of.
customer_reviews.author: Sybil M.

customer_reviews.title: Just what we were looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 87 year old mother. She was having difficulty getting her old recliner down with the handle/pushing foot rest back with legs. This is powered up and down with a button! This is not a lift chair. Just what we needed!
customer_reviews.author: Lesa

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality back of chair is a little short but was great for my mom
customer_reviews.author: Jim923

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Good value. Looks good and is comfortable and firm. I have a bad right shoulder and love the power chair.
customer_reviews.author: jeanie-weanie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value.
customer_reviews.text: Just wish the foot rest was a hair longer. But otherwise, it’s very comfortable, looks nice. It doesn’t rock, which I love. All around nice chair and relatively inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: Moka

customer_reviews.title: after one full year
customer_reviews.text: this chair has held up perfectly after one full year of 24/7 use by my disabled sister; looks and performs like new! i am buying 2 more for our livingroom AWESOME
customer_reviews.author: joanne m.

customer_reviews.title: p0wer recline
customer_reviews.text: I am using this chair in my living room I have lost strength in arms in n my older years I couldnot pull lever to get out of chair now I just puh a button sets wounderful good purchase
customer_reviews.author: gail church

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I love the chair, it's just a little short when it reclines. Nice fabric. Nice color. I would buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Shari

customer_reviews.title: Double check the measurements
customer_reviews.text: We were told it was a chair for BIG & TALL! It is not anywhere near close for a big & tall person to be comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Awesome chair for a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome chair for a reasonable price. Very comfortable. Have taken a few naps on this already. Love the overstuffed arms. Do need a pillow when it reclines, but this chair is great so far.
customer_reviews.author: keith rutherford

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item
customer_reviews.text: It arrived a week early. "Instructions written in Spanish. It was in two pieces, had to put together. Need instructions on how to take it apart as we are returning the item. It is not a lift chair. I mistakenly ordered it. FED Ex just dropped it off outside door. Kenneth Cook
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Cook

customer_reviews.title: Great Recliner
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased to replace another brands of electric recliner. It is the right size for me (5"1") and was easy to put together. Delivered timely. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Yorkie Mom

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: So glad that I decided to order this chair!! Delivered to my door and so easy to put together in just 2 steps. Just slip the back of the recliner into the two slots in the back and plug in the electric recliner level and you are set to enjoy a wonderfully relaxing time. The cushions are pleasantly soft and comfortable. I'm 5' 6'" tall and the seat is plenty wide for me. This recliner met all of my expectations and then some!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Shea
